event_summary: Literary festival celebrating contemporary fiction, poetry, and non-fiction with author readings, panel discussions, and book signings.
commentary_summary: Literary critics applauded the diverse representation of voices and thought-provoking discussions on modern literature.
next_event_plan: Create year-round reading clubs and establish emerging writer residency program
event_highlight: Surprise appearance by Nobel Prize-winning author with exclusive new chapter reading
event_object: To celebrate literary excellence and connect readers with authors from around the world
event_conclusion: Featured 200 authors, sold 50,000 books, and launched 15 new publishing deals
event_conclusion_overall: Tremendous success in promoting reading culture and supporting both established and emerging writers
next_event_suggestion: Add children's literature day and create podcast recording studios for author interviews
